body: See you guys in a few months
PLEASE SUPPORT AKAO SO THAT FOLLOWING CHAPTERS MIGHT BE RELEASED SOON

hey, guys, I found another series that is a little bit similar.  "[Okada Kou] Oya no Inuma no Sentaku | While our parents are away"  
I could lmao when I see people acting like they think they're critics from the New York Times.  Saying things like, " I've seen this shallow melodrama too many times"  as if they're critiqueing a best-selling novel.  lmao.  First of all, it doesn't meet the requirements for a melodrama.  Second, it's supposed to have this sort of plot.  Third, failing to appreciate the art is unforgiveable.  Fourth, if it tried to "deliver a moral message" it would have come off snide and preachy.
I think this is wonderful and sexy with beautifully drawn characters.  It's a favorite of mine, but I don't have the lofty, high-blown goal of reading a work of great literature here.  Also, it seems that few people can appreciate the difficulty of putting a manga like this one together.

I would like it if the last two chapters built up to a little romance, and definitely would like a kiss by chapter 5, six at the lates, but it's not my story, and I respect this author's talent and skill and good taste.  Mostly I love this.  I read it too fast despite trying to draw it out.  So sexy.  The brother is hot, handsome, and cute.  very well drawn.

this is what I'm talking about.  The below comment is typical of one of these kids with a pattern identical to their contemporaries.  Coituscoitus, despite the vulgar, filthy sounding name, talks like a preachy old school marm.

These 2 typical denialistic tsundere sib-cons, I guess their obsessive reckless sex is a somewhat atypical contrast to their typical poor emotional relationship. Hopefully, they learn better ways to channel their tsun like banter or countering actual foes rather than these needless emotional walls with each other. But it kind of reminds me of pornhwa & pornga which ironically have plenty fucking despite characters still being clichedly prude & clueless.

@Z777 I've seen this shallow melodrama too many times. It was meh 1st long ago, but it's annoying now. Not enough creators (even in pro media) use deep enough ways to make stories interesting other than characters tending to do to most idiotic/irrational/unwise stuff.
@coituscoitus Chill man, its just a manga
I really hate these contrived stories of fucking where you can be so easily caught 😑
HOW IS SHE STILL NOT PREGNANT
Chapters 1-3 are great, but then looses it  touch. I wish it had a story to built up to the siblings lust for one another instead of them jumping right into it.

it's still hot af, and it's not that repetitive, they fuck but in different places, school infirmary in this case, it's classic, and it's not that they should do something else, there is tons of too short doujins and H, I prefer it this way anyway, hope they end up in pregnancy test eventually but I'm not in a hurry and enjoy every chapter. And they never kiss, it's only flaw I see here, some passionate wincest kissing would be great.
Getting repetitive, needs some drama/development at this point

Or maybe one of them was adopted when very little and become a couple 🤷‍♂️ but I hope author san continue this nice story👌
